thread.section_title: The Times & The Sunday Times: breaking news & today's latest headlines
thread.title: Zelensky leaves Washington without deal to fire missiles at Russia
thread.title_full: Zelensky leaves Washington without deal to fire missiles at Russia

author: Marc Bennetts
title: Zelensky leaves Washington without deal to fire missiles at Russia
text: President Zelensky will return to Ukraine from Washington without securing permission to use long-range western missiles to strike deep into Russia. Zelensky met President Biden and Kamala Harris, the vice-president, separately at the White House to make a personal plea for the lifting of restrictions on British-supplied Storm Shadow missiles or US-made ATACMS. Western countries have so far allowed Kyiv to use the missiles only to hit Russian forces in border regions. Zelensky was also due to unveil his [plan for victory](https://www.thetimes.com/world/russia-ukraine-war/article/death-in-donbas-frontline-troops-fight-off-defeat-as-zelensky-unveils-victory-plan-8mbwx09m7) in the two-and-a half-year-old war. However, no shift in Washingtonâ€™s stance on the use of the long-range missiles was announced, which came less than 24 hours after President Putin warned that a large conventional air attack on Russia by western-backed Ukraine could [trigger](https://www.thetimes.com/world/russia-ukraine-war/article/vladimir-putin-nuclear-strike-tensions-ukraine-skcwn2kmm)
